ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] anyone want to help with a  film?
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoops! I play DAoC...guess its time for me to unsubscribe from this list. ;-) -Grimrot...formerly known as Nefrit DE Necromancer
ygData.messageBody:
Whoops! I play DAoC...guess its time for me to unsubscribe from this list.

;-)

-Grimrot...formerly known as Nefrit DE Necromancer


On Tuesday 18 June 2002 11:53 pm, eqdocfilm wrote:
> Greetings. My colleague and I are making a documentary about the
> phenomenon of Everquest. We have have become fascinated with all
> aspects of the game. The role-playing, the building up of characters,
> the economy of the game, the way people interact online, etc... We
> hope to explore all these areas of the game by interviewing players,
> spouses, children, parents and even the EQ developers.
>
> We plan on shooting over the next couple of months. We live in Los
> Angeles and are prepared to travel around the country to conduct our
> interviews.
>
> If interested, pease reply to our email eqdocfilm<at>yahoo<dot>com
> and provide us with your age and location (city/state), level and
> guild affiliation, and how long you've been playing the game.
>
> Regards,
> Nina and Andy
>
>
>
>
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
> tolerated
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
